name: Small Hair Bow (Other Colors)
description: CWNJ! sells the cutest bows possible to you. They’re 100% handmade from ourselves. We take our time with them to insure that they will be the best for you. Each bow comes with a clip, that can last through the hardest days and still look adorable. They can be put on either side of the bow, just let us know. Pictured: The Cheetah Bow is the smallest bow to the company, it’s an adorable feature to your hair do. This size comes in different ribbons. All of our bows feature a jewel, brooch or crest in some shape/form. Our MySpace: www.myspace.com/199943001 Other Ribbon:

name: 4 Loop Bows w/ Lace and Jewel Chains
description: This bow is the one that takes so much time, but has an amazing finish. The bow itself is plain, but has a silky touch. Lace is looped from the back to the front of the 1st loop on each side. It’s heavier than most of the other bows, but can still be worn without precautions. It comes with a chain of beads that are hand threaded onto a string that is then attached to the bow. One of the prettiest bows we offer now. Comes in other colors such as: -White -Chocolate Brown -Light Pink -Lavendar The new colors have not yet been tested yet, but will be coming soon. The Lace comes in different colors, ask for a color on the myspace page and we’ll send you pictures of the lace. WE DO NOT HAVE PICTURES OF OTHER LACE BESIDES DARK GREY. ONCE MORE ORDERS, NEW PICTURES WILL COME

options.name: Black Silk w/ Black Metallic Chain
